name: Inite
description: Inite is an AI-driven human innovation network leveraging Web3 technologies. The platform is designed to foster creative idea generation, organize and engage people, automate the innovation process, and manage and pay for copyrights. Inite is an innovative application designed for ideators and visionaries with Web3 rewards. It assists in daily tasks with the help of AI agents, enhancing cognitive skills and supporting mental health.
